job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: AppZen is the leader in Finance AI software Our patented software is the only autonomous spend software to understand financial transactions and enable automatic decisions based on finance policies Using AI deep learning semantic analysis and computer vision AppZen accurately processes intelligence from thousands of data sources and images to better understand financial transactions and empower business decisions AppZen has saved customers more than 500M and increased efficiency by 90 percent by eliminating 1M hours of manual work Over 1000 enterprises use AppZen for autonomous expense and accounts payable processes reduced expenditures and realtime insights into business spend trendsbrbrstronguDescriptionbrbrustrongWe are looking for a Senior Data Scientist who has experience building deep learning computer vision and NLP models to extract key fields from invoices both structured and unstructured text In 2021 we will be accelerating the delivery of AI first aps platform and new AI applications for our customers We value our diversity of perspectives and share a passion for improving the experiences for our customersbrbrstronguWe Are Looking For You IfbrustrongulliYou have 5 years of non internship professional data science experience liliYou have programming experience with PythonliliYou have experience designing predictive paradigms using complex mathematical conceptsliliYou have a masters degree in Operations Research Computer Science or related liliYou have strong fundamental knowledge of Computer Science in algorithm design problem solving and complexity analysisbrliulstronguBonus Points ForbrustrongulliExperience deep learning computer vision and NLP models to extract key fields from invoicesliliExperience running parallel computations in distributed frameworks including Tensorflow Keras and PythonliliExperience using Kubernetes in microservice frameworkliliExperience in communicating with users other technical teams and senior management to collect requirements describe software product features technical designs and product strategyliliExperience influencing software engineers best practice within your
